name: Carnival (itch) (murmupa)
description:
In Russian language so far.

The monk goes to the carnival in order to have some fun and get drunk. However, Heaven does not endorse such a riotous pastime. The angel and the buffoon follow the friar. Pals try not to quarrel and find the right person!

Creator:

Rusakova Irina / murmupa. All artworks used in game are a part of public domain.
